mapper.select: select party.pno, party_name from user_party join party on user_party.pno = party.pno where uno = #{uno}
select plan.plno, plan.title, plan.start, plan.end, plan.img from party join party_detail on party.pno = party_detail.pno join plan on party_detail.plno = plan.plno where party.pno= #{pno}
